== call jquery using loungejs tag ==

<input type="button" name="btn1" value="change html of P tag" />
<input type="button" name="btn2" value="animate a div" />

<p>
A Test P Tag
</p>


<div id="anime">
animate me!
</div>

*( this will run immediately as there is no 'on' event specified )* <br>
<jquery id="j1" $="(document.body).css( 'background', 'gray')" /> <br />

* ( binds btn1 click event to jquery tag of the same id as btn1 ) *<br>
<jquery id="j2" $="('p').html('cool')" on='click' />
<event target="btn1" bind="j2" type="click" call="jquery" />

<jquery id="j3" $="('div').animate({height:300},'slow')" on="click" /> <br />
<event target="btn2" bind="j3" type="click" call="jquery" /> <br />
